description:
Akutagawa catches the flu. Ichiyo does everything in her power to help him, but she just can’t seem to make things work.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ganbare Higuchi-san! / Senro wa Tsuzuku yo Dokomademo / Kagemusha Mushamusha Daisakusen
Hang in There, Higuchi-san! / And the Tracks Go On and On / Operation Body Double Nom Nom
がんばれ樋口さん! / 線路は続くよどこまでも / 影武者むしゃむしゃ大作戦
